name: Cal Omega: Game 15.9
overview: Draw Poker with 2 Wild Jokers in every deck plus the exciting Double-Up feature. Player can discard up to 5 cards per hand. When the player has a winning hand, he has 2 choices. He may keep his win with the 'Take' button or try to double it with the 'Double' button. If he selects 'Double', 2 more choices appear, 'Big' or 'Small'. If 'Big' is selected, the next card to appear must be higher than an '8' to win. If a Joker appears, it's an automatic win. Winning doubles the player's skill points.
